content:
Update:

I have 5 email accounts in my Thunderbird app. All 5 exhibit the same behavior...that is, no emails are listed in the inbox even though I know there are emails that should be there, nor in any of the folders for each account. On one account (Hotmail) There is an unread flag showing 60 unread even though none are visile.

Was wondering if I have exceeded the mailbox size and if installing the 64bit version would help. Would I lose my existing emails and folders?

Thanks. This is getting scary.
creator: rsagun

content:
• Please start *Windows* in safe mode with networking enabled - win8 https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17076/windows-8-startup-settings-safe-mode
  • Still in Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot mode https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem go away?
creator: wsmwk

content: Penso tu debba spiegare meglio il tuo problema. La posta elettronica di base non è mai stata cifrata End-To-End. Si può ottenere questo risultato con applicazioni esterne, ma come procedere dipende da caso a caso.
creator: @next

content: to the right of the 'quick filter' button above the message list pane is a small icon. Click that and change from 'card view' to table view'
creator: davidsk
